fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A map accompanying Friday’s coronavirus coverage showed school closures across Europe, but wrongly included Hungary among the countries with all schools closed. Only universities in Hungary were closed at that time; the government later announced that schools would close from 16 March (Almost every European country has closed or restricted schools to combat Covid-19, 13 March, page 7). • Other recently amended articles include: UK more nostalgic for empire than other ex-colonial powers Trump tests negative for coronavirus and expands travel ban to UK and Ireland ‘Hammer blow’: UK live music sector faces coronavirus disaster Italian journalists battle to keep going as thirst for news grows The Great British deference is dangerous in this time of crisis Anger grows at Trump administration’s coronavirus testing failures Maryland man fatally shot by police ‘while asleep in his bedroom’ UK supermarkets ration toilet paper to prevent stockpiling
